object.title: Tod und Leben
object.label: Painted by Gustav Klimt in different years: 1921 and 1924.

object.title: Statue des hl. Leopold
object.label: Eine von zwei Statuen auf der Kirche am Steinhof, eines der Hauptwerke des Jugendstil. Wie auch die Kirche von Otto Wagner konzipiert.

object.title: Mona Lisa
object.label: This object was created by Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci in the year 1513. The best known, the most visited, the most written about, the most sung about, the most parodied work of art in the world.

object.title: David
object.label: This object was created by Michelangelo di Lodovico Buonarroti Simoni in the year 1504. David is a masterpiece of Renaissance sculpture created in marble. David is a 5.17-metre (17.0 ft) marble statue of the Biblical hero David, a favoured subject in the art of Florence.

object.title: Black Square
object.label: This object was created by Kazimir Malevich in the year 1915. This work is frequently invoked by critics, historians, curators, and artists as the "zero point of painting".

tags.tag: Style of painting born in the early 20th century which abstracts by reducing subjects to geometric outlines.
